page.title: 05PARENTS JOBS IN WHITTON
page.content: Children from Class 4A reently did a survey on our parents.When asked "Do you have a job" 82% of fathers held a job. Mothers were asked the same question and 55% had a job.Out of the 18 fathers who had a job 88% work outside the area, in the mothers case 7 of them (58%) work beyond our area. Six catagories of employment came up in the survey. These were skilled, professional,white collar, engineer, own business and general. Out of the 17 mothers who work none of them are skilled 5 are professional 8 are white collar none of them are engineers or own businesses.4 mothers come under the catagory of general.2 of the 22 fathers are skilled, 9 are professional, 3 are white collar, 4 are engineers, 2 run their own business and 2 are general. CHASE BRIDGE SCHOOL
